metadata.title: Omri Jukin
metadata.description: Full Stack Developer | Electrical Engineer | Data Management Expert

common.description: Innovative full-stack engineer with a strong background in electrical engineering and passion for creating efficient, user-focused solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Innovative full-stack engineer with a strong background in electrical engineering and passion for creating efficient, user-focused solutions.
about.profile:
• Innovative full-stack engineer with a strong background in electrical engineering and passion for creating efficient, user-focused solutions.

• Proven ability in developing scalable applications and managing complex data systems.

• Extensive experience in the insurance industry, from customer service to core system development.

• Demonstrated leadership in training and mentoring teams, process improvement, and driving organizational change and growth.

• Strong problem-solving skills with emphasis on system design and optimization.

• Commitment to continuous learning and professional growth in the technology industry.

career.title: Career
career.experience: Hands-on experience in full-stack development, team management, and process improvement at leading technology and insurance companies.

details: Developed a comprehensive platform that aggregates and processes critical market data from government entities
Designed and implemented a modular, reusable UI component library that reduced development time by 30%
Collaborated with design teams to create intuitive interfaces that increased user engagement
Developed efficient algorithms for data processing that improved system performance and reduced data processing time by 50%
Tech stack: Next.js, tRPC, PayloadCMS, Storybook, Jest, Vitest, React
Designed and maintained business rules system, managing thousands of policy rules and regulations
Mentored and trained new developers, reducing onboarding time and improving team productivity
Led development of 12+ new insurance products, resulting in higher customer acquisition rates
Successfully migrated critical components from 40-year-old monolithic system to modern architecture
Achieved 95% customer satisfaction rate while handling complex insurance inquiries and complaints
Developed and implemented new workflow protocols that reduced average handling time by 25%
Trained and mentored 10+ new team members, resulting in 35% reduction in training time
Collaborated with multiple departments to resolve complex customer issues, improving resolution time by 30%
Maintained 90% customer satisfaction rate while handling high-volume inquiries
Implemented new workflow protocols that reduced response time by 35%
Successfully trained and mentored 15+ team members, improving overall team performance by 30%
Collaborated with various departments, resulting in 40% improvement in case resolution time

resume.title: Resume
resume.networkingSummary: Download my resume to learn more about my background
resume.experience:
I am a passionate and driven full-stack developer with a strong foundation in electrical engineering and a proven track record of delivering results in high-pressure environments. My experience spans from leading the development of scalable platforms and modular UI libraries to optimizing business logic and mentoring teams in the insurance and telecommunications industries.

I excel at solving complex problems, driving innovation, and collaborating across disciplines to achieve ambitious goals. My colleagues recognize me for my relentless work ethic, attention to detail, and commitment to continuous learning. Whether building robust backend systems, designing intuitive interfaces, or streamlining workflows, I always give my best to ensure quality and impact.

If you're looking for someone who combines technical expertise with leadership, creativity, and a genuine passion for making a difference, let's connect!

projects.title: Key Projects
projects.description: Notable projects demonstrating technical expertise and innovation

list.title: Snow HQ
list.description: Enterprise-level CRM system featuring real-time analytics, automated workflows, and advanced reporting capabilities. Built with Next.js, tRPC, Drizzle ORM, and PostgreSQL.

list.title: Clothest
list.description: Wardrobe management system with personalized recommendations and inventory tracking. Built with React, Express.js, and MongoDB.

interests.title: Professional Interests
additional: Founder of a community promoting critical thinking, rationality, and open discussions
Involved in public speaking and live broadcasts on topics related to hard sciences, soft sciences, rational thinking, and technology
Amateur magician, using creative skills to engage audiences and encourage curiosity

hero.title: Crafting digital magic

about.title: Who I Am
about.subtitle: EXPLORE MY CREATIVE TOOLKIT
about.description: I'm a passionate developer and designer who believes that great digital experiences come from the perfect blend of technical expertise and creative vision. With years of experience crafting web applications, I've learned that the best solutions are those that not only work flawlessly but also delight users at every interaction.

questions.question: What drives you?
questions.answer: Solving complex problems and creating elegant solutions that make a real impact.

questions.question: Your work style?
questions.answer: Methodical yet creative, with a focus on user experience and clean code.

questions.question: Biggest achievement?
questions.answer: Leading the development of enterprise-level systems that serve thousands of users.

questions.question: What excites you?
questions.answer: Learning new technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

questions.question: Your philosophy?
questions.answer: Great software should be invisible—users should focus on their goals, not the interface.

questions.question: Future goals?
questions.answer: Building innovative products that solve real-world problems at scale.
